name: UPdex - Delivery that is 'Close Enough'
description:
Have you ever had something delivered in such a shape, that you question whether the driver even bothered coming to the door, let alone put the package down gently? Then you've probably been the (un)lucky recipient of a UPdex delivery! The only delivery service where your exact specifications are occasionally read and the drivers live by the company slogan:

"Close enough!"
